page.title: 15FISHING IN BACK
page.content: {COMMERCIAL FISHING Only 3 people in the area are employed as fishermen.There is only one fishing boat and it operates out of Stornoway. The principal catches are prawns, white fish and sand eels. {SEA ANGLING Sea angling is a favourite summer sport in Broad Bay.There are 13 boats in the area-10 small open rowing boats and 2 fibre glass launches. The boats are pulled up on the beach after each fishing trip.The main catches are mackerel,saithe and whiting. {FRESH WATER FISHING Young boys often fish for brown and sea trout on Coll river. {ILLEGAL FISHING Gill nets are set out on Coll sands when the tide is out.When it comes in fish are trapped.This method is used to trap salmon and sea trout.
